data.title: Visa and Mastercard have a lot in common, but COVID-19 puts one key difference in focus
data.text: Visa Inc. and Mastercard Inc. are often viewed as one and the same in the investment community, but the small differences between their businesses are coming into focus as the COVID-19 alters the way people spend their money.

data.title: Visa's payments volume returned to positive growth in its fiscal Q4 Q4
data.text: The card network's payments volume grew 4% year-over-year (YoY) in its fiscal Q4 2020 (ended September 30, 2020) despite the coronavirus pandemic, per an earnings release.
